module.name: sqltypes
module.short: Types used in various SQL related units

element.name: TSchemaType
element.descr: TSchemaType describes which schema information to retrieve in the call. Depending on its value, the result set of the dataset will have different fields, describing the requested schema data. The result data will always have the same structure.

element.name: TSchemaType.stSchemata
element.short: List of schemas in database(s) (for databases that support them)

element.name: TStatementType
element.short: Type describing the kind of SQL statement
element.descr: TStatementType describes the kind of SQL statement that was entered in the SQL property of a component.

element.name: TStatementType.stUnknown
element.short: The statement type could not be detected.

element.name: TStatementType.stSelect
element.short: The statement is a SQL SELECT statement

element.name: TStatementType.stInsert
element.short: The statement is a SQL INSERT statement

element.name: TStatementType.stUpdate
element.short: The statement is a SQL UPDATE statement

element.name: TStatementType.stDelete
element.short: The statement is a SQL DELETE statement

element.name: TStatementType.stDDL
element.short: The statement is a SQL DDL (Data Definition Language) statement

element.name: TStatementType.stGetSegment
element.short: The statement is a SQL get segment statement

element.name: TStatementType.stPutSegment
element.short: The statement is a SQL put segment statement

element.name: TStatementType.stExecProcedure
element.short: The statement executes a stored procedure

element.name: TStatementType.stRollback
element.short: The statement rolls back a transaction

element.name: TStatementType.stSelectForUpd
element.short: The statement selects data for update

element.name: TDBEventType
element.descr: TDBEventType describes the type of a database event message as generated by through the event.

element.name: TDBEventType.detActualSQL
element.short: Actual SQL as sent to engine message

element.name: TDBEventTypes
element.descr: TDBEventTypes is a set of values, which is used to filter the set of event messages that should be sent. The property determines which events a particular connection will send.

element.name: TQuoteChars
element.descr: TQuoteChars is an array of characters that describes the used delimiters for string values.

element.name: TSqlObjectIdentifierList
element.descr: TSqlObjectIdentifierList is a list class holding a list of elements. It is used in the TSQLConnection.GetObjectNames to return the list of objects requested.

element.name: TSqlObjectIdenfier
element.descr: TSQLObjectIdentifier is a class that represents an SQL identifier in a database. It has 2 parts: the schema name and the object name.

element.name: TSqlObjectIdenfier.Create.ACollection
element.short: Collection which the object belongs to

element.name: TSqlObjectIdenfier.Create.ASchemaName
element.short: Schema in which object is defined.

element.name: TSqlObjectIdenfier.SchemaName
element.descr: SchemaName is the name of the schema in which the object is defined. This is only set if the database actually supports schemas, for other databases, it is empty.

element.name: TSqlObjectIdenfier.ObjectName
element.short: Name of the object in the database
element.descr: ObjectName is the name of the object in the database. If the database supports schemas, then it must be combined with the SchemaName property in order to create a unique name for the object.

element.name: TSqlObjectIdentifierList.AddIdentifier
element.short: Add an identifier to the list

descr.p: AddIdentifier adds an identifier to the list with schema name ASchemaName and object name AObjectName. It returns the new identifier object. Both arguments are optional, their default value is the empty string.
No checking on duplicate entries is performed.

element.name: TSqlObjectIdentifierList.AddIdentifier.AObjectName
element.short: The value for the ObjectName property

element.name: TSqlObjectIdentifierList.AddIdentifier.ASchemaName
element.short: The value for the SchemaName property

element.name: TSqlObjectIdentifierList.Identifiers
element.short: Indexed access to all identifiers in the list.
element.descr: Identifiers gives indexed access to all objects in the list. Valid indexes run from 0 to Count-1. It is the default property of the list class.

element.name: TSqlObjectIdenfier.FullName
element.short: Return the full name of the object
element.descr: FullName returns the name of the object, prepended with the schema name if there is one. Both parts are separated by a dot (.) character.

element.name: TSqlObjectIdenfier.FullName.Result
element.short: The fully qualified name of the object
